appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Automatic voting on minecraft ratings for projects
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

disabledNotifWarnTooltip.message: For example, a notification that you have already voted (This is when the extension tried to vote for the project but you yourself have already voted)

enableSyncStorage.message: Save extension settings in the cloud

enableSyncStorageTooltip.message: It is not recommended to enable this setting if you have a lot of projects in the list of added projects. The cloud has limited traffic and storage space. For this function to work, your account must be connected and synchronization enabled, otherwise the settings will still be saved locally Allows you to synchronize extension settings with multiple computers, it is not recommended to keep the extension enabled with this setting enabled on several computers at once

disabledCheckTime.message: Disable time checking at extension start

disableCheckProjects.message: Disable check when adding a project
disableCheckProjects.description: Checkbox. Disable check when adding a project

disableCheckProjectsTooltip.message: It is highly discouraged to disable this check, it can cause errors in the extension and can break the auto-voting mechanism, this setting disables checking when adding a project, this disables checking for MCRate (As you know, you can vote there only for one project per day) It also disables check for VK authorization This parameter is not saved when saving the settings
disableCheckProjectsTooltip.description: Tooltip. Disable check when adding a project

priorityTooltip.message: When this option is enabled and after when adding a project, the project will be in priority, it will always be the very first to vote and without a delay of 10 minutes

enabledSilentVoteTooltip.message: Quiet Mode (Recommended) - Vote for projects entirely in the background without opening any tabs. Emulation mode - emulates a real user, opens a tab and clicks on the voting button, it is best to leave at least one open tab in the browser in this mode, otherwise the browser window will be open on top of other windows and may cause inconvenience.

addedProjects.message: List of projects you have already added

notAdded.message: You haven't added any projects to this top yet!
notAdded.description: Notification. You haven't added any projects

notAvaibledInSilent.message: By default, it is not available in silent voting mode!
notAvaibledInSilent.description: Notification. available in silent voting mode
